description: The perfect gift for yourself or the crafter lover! This kit for beginner with basic knowledges of embroidery, or an experienced stitcher. There are a couple basic stitches needed for this pattern and they are explained in the step by step instruction.
1pc bamboo embroidery hoop 1pc gray cotton stamped embroidery cloth 1pc scissors color threads embroidery needles English instructions
How to Use the Embroidery Hoop

1. Separate the inner and outer frame. 2. Place the outer frame on the flat table. (frame face down) 3. Cover the flat embroidered cloth on the outer frame. (Embroidered face down) 4. Lightly press the inner frame into the outer frame with embroidered cloth together. ( inner frame face down) 5. Flip the embroidered cloth to feel the tightness, it can be used for embroidery in tight state.
Material: Cotton Embroidery Hoop Material: Bamboo Hoop Size: Diameter 20cm( 8" ) Cloth Size: 28 X 28cm(11" X 11")
The pre-printed pattern is made of special soluble ink, please do not touch with water before finishing, otherwise, the pattern will disappear.
